com.schneewittchen.rosandroid.model.repositories

Class RosRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.schneewittchen.rosandroid.model.repositories.rosRepo.RosRepository

  • public class RosRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    The ROS repository is responsible for connecting to the ROS master and creating nodes depending on the respective widgets.
    Version:
    1.1.1
    Author:
    Nico Studt

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RosRepository getInstance()
        Return the singleton instance of the repository.
        Returns:
        Instance of this Repository

      • connectToMaster

        public void connectToMaster()
        Connect all registered nodes and establish a connection to the ROS master with the connection details given by the already delivered master entity.

      • disconnectFromMaster

        public void disconnectFromMaster()
        Disconnect all running nodes and cut the connection to the ROS master.

      • updateMaster

        public void updateMaster(MasterEntity master)
        Change the connection details to the ROS master like the IP or port.
        Parameters:
        master - Master data

      • updateWidgets

        public void updateWidgets(java.util.List<BaseEntity> widgets)
        React on a widget change. If at least one widget is added, deleted or changed this method should be called.
        Parameters:
        widgets - Current list of widgets

      • informWidgetDataChange

        public void informWidgetDataChange(BaseData data)
        Find the associated node and inform it about the changed data.
        Parameters:
        data - Widget data that has changed

      • addNode

        private void addNode(BaseEntity widget)
        Create a node for a specific widget entity. The node will be created and subsequently registered.
        Parameters:
        widget - Widget to be added

      • updateNode

        private void updateNode(BaseEntity widget)
        Update a widget and its associated Node by ID in the ROS graph.
        Parameters:
        widget - Widget to update

      • removeNode

        private void removeNode(BaseEntity widget)
        Remove a widget and its associated Node in the ROS graph.
        Parameters:
        widget - Widget to remove

      • registerNode

        private void registerNode(BaseNode node)
        Connect the node to ROS node graph if a connection to the ROS master is running.
        Parameters:
        node - Node to connect

      • unregisterNode

        private void unregisterNode(BaseNode node)
        Disconnect the node from ROS node graph if a connection to the ROS master is running.
        Parameters:
        node - Node to disconnect

      • reregisterNode

        private void reregisterNode(BaseNode node)
        Result of a change in the internal data of a node header. Therefore it has to be unregistered from the service and reregistered due to the implementation of ROS.
        Parameters:
        node - Node main to be reregistered

      • getDeviceIp

        private java.lang.String getDeviceIp()
